Datamodel version 0.1

28 April 2009

Version 0.1 (early Alpha) of the datamodel

There are some parts of programming which seem to go better without a computer at hand. Last weekend, during a quite moment I took pen and paper drew upthe first draft of the datamodel of Seccubus v2.
